Mechanism_of_Action.text: Sulfur donor that promotes conversion of cyanide to thiocyanate

Comments.text:
Whereas the nitrites have adverse effects (induction of
methemoglobinemia
), sodium thiosulfate is non-toxic
Should avoid nitrites in
cyanide toxicity
